The dreaded demon, Majin Buu sat on his haunches, staring at the hourglass with growing impatience. Why did he agree to wait? This was so stupid. But he couldn't find the really strong guy anywhere. Speaking of mad...he was getting tired of those people staring at him. Buu could feel their eyes on him. He considered killing them...but if he looked away from the hourglass, the sand might go back up (he wasn't very bright). And then SHE walked up to him.

Buu glanced up at the yapping woman with the black hair and angry scowl. This only made him angrier because he felt like he had been tricked into looking away. Well, he'd show her! With a flick of his...head...tail...thing, Buu zapped her. He caught the egg she had transformed into before crushing it.

Actually...that had been kinda fun. Standing up, Buu regarded the others with a wide grin. Now that he thought about it...he was kinda hungry... Licking his lips with his wide blue tongue, he turned his attention to the small child. "Gonna make you into chocolate..." he snickered. He delighted in how terrified the statement made the others look. The baby was bawling, as expected.

That's when the blonde lady flew at him. It was almost funny when she punched him. "Don't you touch my daughter..." she hissed. Daughter, huh? Well, maybe Buu could scare them even more. The other humans were freaking out, as one would expect. That's when Buu felt...weird...like something was boiling up inside him. To his surprise, he found that his body was indeed inflating!

It would seem that would be another issue to be taken at another time. Clearly, she was simply acting to convince Lady Buu had an turned-ally on her side. It was good acting Gohan had to admit.

'Videl! What are you planning?' he thought back, knowing he and she would now be able to easily communicate telepathically.

'I have a plan...but it's risky. I don't know how I didn't turn evil but I should be able to use this new body to our advantage...'

Gohan frowned. He didn't like the sound of a risky plan especially if it would involve his friend. He didn't want to see her come to harm; however, there was not much he could think of that could help him defeat the monster.

'What is it?' he finally asked.

'My plan is to allow me to absorb you. I think I can keep you awake inside me and your power will help me fight Lady Buu. Once I'm able to overpower her, I'll absorb her into my mass and from there, you can break free and perhaps free Android 18. You may be able to even kill off the evil inside me,' she explained.

Gohan gritted her teeth. Immediately, there was so many concerns over this plan. What if she couldn't overpower Lady Buu? What if her personality changes when she absorbs Lady Buu? What if Gohan couldn't escape from the confines of her?

Videl seemed to notice the half-saiyan's worries.

'Gohan, you have to trust me, please! We won't know if we'll ever get this kind of chance again!' she pleaded.

The half-saiyan winced. 'V-videl...I...I just couldn't...I...'

Videl knew that they couldn't keep talking for long or else Lady Buu would surely get suspicious. She mentally sighed.

'Gohan...I...I love you. You've been so supportive of me and I'll always be grateful for allowing me to learn from you. If...if you really love me back, then I ask you to trust me...please...'

Gohan mouth gaped as he heard his friend confess to him...while lightly strangling him. Still, aside from the unromantic situation, he felt...happy. Could he really trust her enough to proceed through her plan wisely...safely..."

The half-saiyan closed his eyes and answered to her.
1212312.title: Pink Videl

12123121.content:
Although he didn't like an uncertain plan, he could think of no other options. Without saying another world to Videl, he nodded subtle.

Videl grinned, keeping up her evil act. "Well then Gohan....I think I could use a little snack.." she purred evilly. Gohan's eyes went wide in false terror. "W....wait!"

"Turn into candy!" Videl roared and fired a beam from her head at him. Within seconds he was a small piece of candy in her palm. "It's been fun Gohan.....so long."

Turning her back so Lady Buu couldn't see, Videl swallowed it, taking great care not to chew or damage it to avoid killing Gohan. It was an odd experience to say the least as she felt him hit her system, carefully focusing to keep him alive and unharmed.

She felt power flowing through her, as Gohan's strength added to her own, and she found herself wearing an identical version of his martial arts uniform. "Huh?.....Weird."

Lady Buu's hand was suddenly on her her shoulder. "Tasty wasn't it?" Videl quickly kept up her facade "Oh yes.....I never knew Gohan was so....delicious." Videl licked her lips.

Meanwhile the others unaware of what was going on only saw their friend seemingly turn evil and devour the one she loved. "No....." Bulma muttered "We're doomed."

The two Buu's eyed the rest of the crowd. "Well then. Shall we finish up here?" Lady Buu smirked evilly.

Videl thought frantically. "Oh no! Should I turn on her now and save them?.....Or....I could absorb them too and keep them safe from her....." Videl always wanted to be a hero. Then again, pretending to be a sultry villainess was kind of fun...
12123121.title: What could go wrong?

121231212.content:
Videl knew that she had a chance at defeating Lady Buu with Gohan safe within her. He was willing to give her all the support she needed; however, she knew that she'd be at a disadvantage with her other friends. She couldn't risk them as spectators because Lady Buu would surely try to kill or absorb them in some horrible fashion.

She'd definitely would have to absorb them. She mentally apologized.

'I'm sorry everyone. I hope you forgive me for doing this but this'll be for the best...' she thought.

'It will be for the best...Videl' she suddenly heard a very familiar voice in her head.

Her eyes widened and she had to hold down her throat from gasping. It was Gohan!

'Gohan! I...can hear...you?' she asked, a bit surprised but also very welcoming at hearing her love.

A nervous chuckled sounded through her mind. It was good ole' Gohan. She slightly blushed and she was thankful she had pink skin or else surely Lady Buu would have noticed.

'Uh...It seems so...I wish I could see what you're doing but speaking like this will have to do. So you're going to absorb them all?' he asked.

She mentally nodded with a sad smile. 'Yes...I...I don't see any other way. It's best to protect them. I just hope they don't think badly of me since I won't have time to explain to all of them what I'm about to do...'

Luckily, Gohan understood her. She could feel so much trust and love pouring from him and wondered if that was part of absorbing him. Who knew, but it was definitely motivating.

'You do what you have to. i've trusted you with my life and I know you'll do the same with my friends and family...I'll explain to them when they're with me...' he agreed.

Videl nodded while she smirked with "evil intentions" at the group. She willed many pieces of her pink fleshy goo to slip apart of her. When she had finally separated enough of herself, she tapped against the marble tiles of the lookout and speedily charged at the group with pink blobs following her.

ChiChi was...cracked as an egg...Master Roshi was vaporized...18 was absorbed...Krillin was absorbed...and...Marron was horrifically dropped from the lookout...

Her eyes tightened in pain as she thought about them. Lady Buu would definitely suffer for this!

...but for now, her eyes looked to the people she could protect. All that was left were Bulma, Yamcha, Mr. Popo, Oolong, and the Ox King, Piccolo, Goten, and Trunks were still in the hyperbolic time chamber. Perhaps they would finish in time...perhaps, but right now...all she could do is focus on the present.

She watched while putting on her evil facade. She felt her small pieces of her grow and wrap around them...caccooning them and making them perfect for absorption. All of them struggled but it was futile. Videl knew she was doing the right thing.

A quick sad smile flashed on her pink face before she put back on an evil grin. She pulled up her arm and flicked her index finger towards her, willing her pieces of her to join back with her.

The pieces of goo merged together and the groans and moans filled the air, muffled by her pink flesh. Once it had accumulated together, it jumped, flying towards Videl.

At the same time, Lady Buu smirked. Proud to have given birth to such a great sister. She and her would no doubt rule the universe easily and nobody could stop her.

Videl was slightly unprepared to the upheaval of people she was trying to absorb at the same time as the massive blob of flesh smashed into her and wrapped around her like pink-bubble gum. To Videl's shame, she was unable to help but moan from the amount of pleasure and completeness she was feeling.

Her body dropped and came back up, looking more like a abstract pink blob than a person. Soon though, arms started to form...legs started to form...her head started to form. While these formations occurred, the teenage girl was unable to stop groaning as she felt her friends become a part of her. She felt complete...and...Gohan loved her...Gohan completed her...They all completed her!
121231212.title: Videl "attacks" Bulma and the others.

choices: Videl gives Lady Buu a taste of her own medicine.
Videl hides to recover for the moment.
1212312121.content:
They all completed her.....but that's why she needed to take Buu down. With a few deep breaths an a puff of steam from her various holes along her new pink flesh, Videl controlled the rush of power, and calmed down.

She looked down at herself and noticed her outfit didn't change, probably because Gohan was still the strongest in her, but she noticed her body seemed...more curvy... probably as a result of Bulma. Not that it really mattered, she could probably alter her body to look any way she wished now.

She felt a hand on her shoulder and looked to see Lady Buu. "It's always a rush absorbing someone...isn't it." Videl grinned "Oh. It is indeed."

"Well sister. Shall we start destroying the planet now?" Videl looked around. Everyone was safe within her, it was the perfect time to strike. "Of course....but first....."

"First?" Lady Buu questioned before getting an elbow right in her face pushing it right in. "FIRST YOU'RE GONNA PAY FOR THIS!" Videl roared, adding an additional kick and punch to Buu before getting smacked away.

Buu's injuries quickly smoothed out. "You....so you were tricking me! After I made you so much better than a mere human." Videl stopped. It was true she did improve her bu....WHAM! Buu drove a fist straight into her gut causing Videl to yell in pain and double over, a huge fist imprint in her stomach.

"Ughh..." Videl groaned but the pain quickly faded, and in seconds she felt good as new. "Wow...." She must have Buu's healing ability amongst others. "Ok Buu.....let's see how you take...." she formed an energy blast, a far superior one to the weak little energy she'd managed as a human. "THIS!" and blasted at Lady Buu, only for her to "flow" away from the blast, like she was made of water.

"What?!" Videl charged to punch her, but Lady Buu "flowed" again out of her reach, causing her to punch thing air.

Videl spun to look where her enemy was, and noticed her hovering above her, sporting an almost comically inflated stomach and chest. "What the..." Videl started before Lady Buu exhaled, blowing a hurricane force wind at her and deflating back to her normal proportions.

Videl was blown head over heels, and crashed into the center of the lookout.

Lady Buu sneered. "Girl. You're still fighting like a human."

Videl clenched her teeth. "Anything you can do.....I can do better!"
1212312121.title: Videl remains stable...remembering her objectiv...

choices: ...Lady Buu's life energy vanished. She was hiding herself, perhaps?
Goten and Trunks appeared with Piccolo at their side.
12123121211.content:
With her foot against the floor of the stone building, she looked around her and was thankful that the main temple was still in tact besides her crash. If the whole thing crashed, Goten, Trunks, and Piccolo would be trapped inside the hyperbolic time chapter forever!

She then blinked. Wait...how did she know about that?

Her eyes furrowed. It was Mr. Popo. She felt him...and his knowledge pouring into her. Not only that, the other's knowledge was available to her as well! It felt so...foreign but incredible at the same time!

"Is that all you got, sister!? My efforts in changing you would've gone to waste if I had known you were this stupid!" Lady Buu taunted.

Videl growled but a sly smirk transformed her face. If she was truly incapable as a fighter...which she wasn't, certainly her new pool of knowledge could help her fight the pink bitch. In other words...Gohan.

The transformed teenaged girl had to admit that Gohan was far more experienced than her. Memories flooded her from the half-saiyan's past...Namek...Cell. He was so resilient yet he had gone through so many struggles, Videl had to wonder how he was able to survive. In the end, it didn't matter. Gohan was trusting her with himself. She felt all of them trusting her now...knowing the truth. She wouldn't let their strengths or knowledge go to waste.

She closed her eyes and tapped her feet against the stone building. She would take this outside the lookout to prevent any unnecessary damages. With a glare at her opponent, she pushed against the tiling and bounded at her "sister".

Lady Buu grinned and was ready to block or counter-attack; however, Videl instead flew past the pink monster...or rather, her top portion of her body did. Taken surprise, Lady Buu turned around clearly missing the fact that Videl's body had stretched and her legs were approaching fast.

Taken in even greater shock, the legs slammed into Lady Buu's back and a groan escaped from her mouth. Videl let her body pull itself back to normal and locked her hands together. With her knees putting a blow to the female Buu's back, her front portion was able to come back fast enough that Videl could slam her locked fists across her sister's head.

From the momentum of Videl and her rebound, Lady Buu cut down, past the lookout and into the dry mountains below. Not wasting any time, she flew down and raised her hands, outputting a flurry of pink energy balls that crashed down, flattening the mountains even more.

Videl stopped her energy flurry until she was able to land softly on to the ground. She frowned and took a good look at her surroundings. She had done good damage to the mountains but that wasn't the target. Her main target was counter-part.

With her senses, she knew that Lady Buu wasn't going to be dead by that. Before she could recover though, Videl knew she had to keep the momentum on her side.

Suddenly...
12123121211.title: Videl gives Lady Buu a taste of her own medicine.

choices: Videl lets her anger get the better of her..
121231212111.content:
Videl blinked. She couldn't feel Lady Buu anymore. But she couldn't have killed her with only that alone. Could she?

"She must be hiding her power." Videl mutters, before wondering how she knew that. Gohan again, no doubt. Which didn't leave her many options. If she left who knows where Buu could get to. She supposed she could just level the mountain range so she'd have no where to hide.....

"I can't do that!" Videl was horrified she'd even thought of that solution. Sure no people were there, but it would be an unnecessery use of force that could ruin that areas ecosystem for years, if not forever. Just thinking about all the animals losing their home made her stomach turn. "How could I even consider it......"

"Still thinking like a weak human sister." a voice purred in her ear, before a strong hand roughly wrapped around her neck. It was Lady Buu! She snuck up on her while she was in thought!

Videl found the ground coming at her extremely fast as Buu dove towards the ground, ramming her face first into it. "You'll never beat me like that." Buu sneered. Holding her roughly in the air, she stroked Videl's stomach, almost lovingly. "Hiding your friends from me....you didn't digest any of them did you? They're only going to hold you back."

"Shut...up....you MONSTER!" Videl roared, slipping out her grip and moving to the side.

"You're a monster now too. Or didn't you notice?" Lady Buu grinned, before flying at Videl driving a fist into her stomach. As Videl fell to her knees winded, Buu took to the air, landing on a mountain ridge nearby. Buu raised a hand, taunting her to attack.

As soon as Videl recovered she flew at her, gracefully dodging the pink energy blasts sent her way, but not so gracefully dodging the extended fist smacking her like a whip, driving her back to where she was.

Buu waggled a finger tauntingly. Videl growled in frustration, and launched a blast of her own, which was easily dodged by Buu slipping her rubbery form out of the way, firing two blasts back, which Videl barely dodged.

Lady Buu yawned, stretching. "How boring....." she sat down and closed her eyes.

"Is she mocking me!" Videl hissed. "Let's see her block this with her eyes closed." Videl fired another energy blast, but Buu still easily swatted it away. Apprantly she could sense them coming.

"How dare she...." Videl growled, steam actually starting to vent from the holes on her skin because of her attitude. Buu was clearly mocking her, showing her that Videl was woefully not experienced in this level of combat. Suddenly destroying the mountain seemed like a very good idea after all.....

Of course she had other ranged options she thought, remembering how Lady Buu had sent her flying earlier with just her breath and how the original Buu had blown away people and buildings from the cities without turning whole area into a wasteland.

But she was just....making her so....MAD!
121231212111.title: ...Lady Buu's life energy vanished. She was...

choices: ...decided enough was enough. Time to assimilate her back!
1212312121111.content:
Gohan was becoming increasingly worried now. He could sense Videl getting angry. Heck, he didn't even need to sense to know that his pod and surroundings were rumbling as if he was in an earthquake.

Knowing what he had to do, he called out to his captor in an attempt to calm her down. This was exactly what Lady Buu wanted after all...and Videl would just be playing by her rules if she was to let her emotions run wild.

'Videl, calm yourself! Getting angry is just what your enemy wants. You have to control your emotions!' Gohan thought.

Outside, Videl gritted her teeth. Normally, she would have a high enough tolerance for such taunting; however, her emotions weren't being contain like normally. Somehow...it was even more difficult to calm herself in front of this pink bitch, who she wanted more than anything than to kill.

It...it must've been this new body. It had a low tolerance and...it was affecting her emotionally. She knew the half-saiyan was right and getting pissed is only what Lady Buu wanted...but how could she control her emotions and maintain herself? How?

'It's...hard, Gohan. I've...I've never fallen to such a low taunting before.' Videl responded with an angry tone in her voice, 'I want to rip her throat out! Especially after all she's done!'

'Forget about everything then! Forget about her or fighting! My father and Piccolo always told me to keep a clear mind...if you don't, it'll become your worse enemy...' Gohan explained.

Videl shook but nodded, taking deep breaths and closing her eyes. While it may have not been the best time when her opponent was in front of her, she knew that Gohan was right. Her greatest enemy would be her own emotions if she could not control them. It didn't matter if her body affected her...she was still in control. She had the will to maintain herself.

Her mind settled into a different locale. Not one of broken rocks and mountains, but a spring. A nice warm spring where she could relax her body. Ease her tensions.

She felt warm...and Gohan was with her as well. He loved her. It was felt now and in this dream world.

Then, her anger dissipated and so did the springs and the half-saiyan. Nothing was felt and that in itself, was the best thing right now. It allowed her to focus outside instead of herself. Thank god Mr. Popo was here to help her control her emotions.

She then opened her eyes...to the real world. Lady Buu had taken the opportunity to attack her and was a foot away from decking her in the head. Even while seeing a punch, she felt...strangely content. Everything was clear...meaning that everything she was capable of doing could be clearer.

With that, her arm swiftly was raised and she caught the monster's fist with her hand. Lady Buu widened her dark eyes in surprise, not expecting such a block. Videl simply looked at her and smiled.

"I'll remain in control of this battle, thank you very much," the teenage girl stated and promptly squeezed the fist causing Lady Buu to wince.

Not taking a moment of hesitation, she pulled the pink monster closer and surprised her again by raising her head and slamming it against the monster's pink flesh.

Lady Buu cursed as she flew back but was able to steady herself and stop herself from hitting anything more. It was her time to growl in deep annoyance. Of course, that simple smile Videl had seemed to taunt her greater than her verbal assaults had!

The female monster growled and...
1212312121111.title: Controlling emotions

choices: But the weaker Buu fired it, and Videl reflects the attack.
12123121211111.content:
Lady Buu growled. "I see turning you was a mistake." A small portion of her without Videl's knowledge slowly moved off her back and onto the ground. "It's too bad I can't take that back...."

Videl's eyes went wide. "Wait, you mean I'm stuck like this?" Videl knew that was a likely possibility, and she couldn't imagine spending the rest of her life like this, but to hear it flat out...

Buu grinned "Of course if you'd let me just swallow you again I could maybe reverse the process." She beckoned her to come closer.

Before the barrage of thoughts from the people within her telling her "NO!" in many variations, was even sent however, Videl smirked. "You think I'm stupid? You'll just take all the power I have for your own, and even if you didn't nobody will left to stop you!"

"That's not true." Lady Buu raised her hands innocently silently beckoning the segment of her. At Videl's raised eyebrow she smirked. "I could also reprogram you properly this time!"

Videl braced herself for Buu's attack, but it didn't come. "What is she waiting for?" Videl wondered. "If you're trying to taunt me some more, I told you! It won't work!"

"Oh yes. I know." Lady Buu drawled out. "Is she just keeping me talking? What is....." Videl mentally ran through what she instinctively knew of a Buu, and now her own, abilities. Stalling was a suggested tactic if....."

Videl turned behind her to see the massive pink blob of goo flying towards her. "No you don't!" Videl raised her hands and fired a massive energy beam, the blasted a hole through it, dropping it to the ground in its path.

Videl eyed the lump cautiously. "Sorry Buu, but I saw that...." Buu laughed. "Coming. I knew....."

Suddenly the lump sprang back to life, forming itself into a perfect copy of Lady Buu. "You would" the copy finished her statement, before stretching towards her.

"Ugh....get off!" Videl kicked out, not even that strongly, only for the copy to go flying. "...Wow.....that was easy." It's just a small part of her. Gohan said from within. You're much stronger! Destroy it now!

Videl aimed at the fallen Buu. "Feels nice to be the strong one for a change. Bye bye...." But before she could fire she felt someone grab her from behind.

"Forget about the other me?" Lady Buu hissed in her ear. Videl struggled to break free, but the real Buu wasn't someone she could overpower as easily. "Weren't expecting this were you. Thank your friend 18 for the idea." And the other Buu standing up, made her even more nervous.

The copy aimed her head tail at Videl. Slowly moving toward her. "It's been fun sister. Actually, thinking about it, it hasn't. But I'm sure you and you boyfriend will be delicious."

She fired the dreaded pink transformation ray, no doubt going to turn into some kind of tasty treat.....
12123121211111.title: A Videl snack! Or is it?

choices: A man, one who is weak to her sexual advances and techniques.
121231212111112.content:
Videl saw the attack coming, yet couldn't do anything to dodge it in time. With the second Buu keeping her in check, the ray hit her right in the chest as the effect began changing her whole body into something else.

It turned out Buu wanted to change her into...
121231212111112.title: And gets a perfect hit.

choices: Lady Buu begrudgingly turns Videl back.
NO! Videl would tire out! ...maybe...hopefully. (Probably not)
1212312121111122.content:
Lady Buu laughed as she tossed the delicious little morsel up into the air. What an idiot...it didn't matter how much stronger Videl had been compared to her...and with all the powerful warriors she absorbed, she most certainly had been...Lady Buu only had Android 18 to go off of. No, it didn't matter because the idiot had fallen right into...

Wait...why hadn't the candy landed in her mouth yet?

POW!

Lady Buu flipped around in the air as something hit her right in the face. She whipped around, looking for her attacker, only to get hit from behind. She flew foward with the impact...and...and then something burst through her back and out her chest. It was a piece of candy. "What the hell...?!" Lady Buu exclaimed.

"No idea," the candy replied. "All I know is that being turned into...what is this anyway? Toffee? Anyway, all I know is that I'm still aware and able to move. But hey, you wanted to eat me, right?" The candy flew into Lady Buu's open mouth...and out the back of her head. Lady Buu swung, but it was too hard to hit the tiny piece of candy.
1212312121111122.title: Candy to eat right now.

choices: Lady Buu makes a quick decision, blasting off to a different region...but where?
Videl doesn't allow her to make any decision except being kicked across the face
12123121211111221.content:
With veins popping all over the female pink majin, she eyed the candy ball that had been her sister with seething frustration. It was too fast in its candy ball form and she wasn't sure how she was able to move so freely despite her change into an inanimate, edible object.

Her pink tail on her head flipped forward and she begrudgingly turned her sister back into normal knowing that fighting her this way would prove to be quite the annoyance. An electric pink ray shot from her tail and marked the floating candy ball.

In a cloud of smoke, Videl felt herself change back into her original form. Well, her pink form at least. Blinking, she swatted away the smoke and couldn't help but smirk knowing she was ticking off the bitch in front of her.

"Oh? Was I too sweet for you?" Videl taunted to which her sister simply growled, her eyes narrowed dangerously.

'Videl! Don't get too cocky. You have to finish her quickly!' Gohan spoke in her head.

Videl frowned, knowing Gohan was correct; however, everything had been small victories so far. While she was a little stronger than her, they were both evenly matched.

'Even so Gohan...we're nearly matched when fighting seriously. It's not going to be a fast battle,' she mentally explained.

'Then let me help you out a bit,' Gohan simply stated.

Videl wasn't sure what her friend and now lover was saying but she'd soon find out when a unknown rush of energy started to take hold of her. Instictively, she let out a yell and her aura flared greatly, now a golden color.

Taking control of herself, she stopped exerting herself and felt the new power that was filling her. She realized what Gohan had done...he'd transformed into a super saiyan!

Lady Buu seemed to have noticed the increase of power and was shocked. Trying to make sense out of it, she remembered that she had absorbed Gohan...and from her memories of that fat ugly Buu, he was surely a saiyan that could transform. Gritting her teeth, she eyed her surroundings and back to Videl who stood awed by the power she was feeling.

Now, more than ever, did Lady Buu know that she had to end this quickly...but how? Her original intentions of absorbing her didn't go so well, but of course, she hadn't tried to absorb her the old fashioned way. She would need a distraction though...and quick!

'Why didn't you do that earlier! That would've been immensely helpful!' Videl mentally berated.

'I wanted to wait, Videl. I wasn't sure how you would be able to manage!' Gohan explained with a touch of nervousness.

Videl sighed and shook her head. It made sense though...Heck, she wasn't able to control her emotions in this newfound body until she figured out a method to maintain composure. Surely, there would be more learning experiences that she would have to understand quickly.

Focusing her eyes on Lady Buu who was furious and nervous, she nodded to herself. "It's time to end this."
12123121211111221.title: Lady Buu begrudgingly turns Videl back.

121231212111112211.content:
"W...wait!" Lady Buu put up a hand, just before Videl started punching her lights out.

Despite better judgement Videl ceased her attack. For some reason she just couldn't resist the chance to smugly rub in her newfound strength. "Oh?" she crossed her arms. "You can beg for mercy if you like. Cough up the people inside you and I might just only kill you slightly painfully."

"Yes....well...look behind you!" Lady Buu screamed. "Please. Like I'd fall for...." Videl was promptly tackled from behind by other Lady Buu from the failed attempt to eat her. "Forgot out me did you! I'm gonna....EGH!"

The original winced as her double was promptly manhandled into a pulp by the much stronger Videl. "Yeah good luck!" she flew off at top speed not really paying attention to where she was going.

Lady Buu ran through her victims knowledge of the area. She noticed she was heading...
121231212111112211.title: Lady Buu makes a quick decision, blasting off t...

choices: Videl returns to the lookout to wait out Piccolo, Trunks, and Goten's training
Videl sensed Buu's earlier outburst and takes the fight straight to her!
1212312121111122112.content:
Buu noticed she was heading toward a nearby city, well not exactly nearby but enough to get some distance away from her "super sister". A saiyan, a super saiyan no less! Dammit she should've just absorbed him right away instead of sexing him up instead here she was running away like a coward.

If only that arrogant Vegeta hadn't blown himself to hell...literally maybe, or if Goku, that Super Saiyan 3 wasn't deader then dead! Buu growled her head literally steaming as she came down upon the city blocks surprising many innocent and frighten people.

"What the heck?!"

The man suddenly yelling in horror as Buu vaporized his body without a second thought. She was in no mood for clueless annoying earthlings. Gathering up her rage into her mouth Lady Buu screamed in anger blowing away the unprepared masses along with numerous inanimate objects and the breaking of glass everywhere.

Afterwards Buu realized she needed to keep on the move. With her new power her "sister" could easily catch up to her if she just picked up on that outburst of hers and she wasn't ready for another round with her super sis. She needed time to regather her strength and come up with a plan where she came out the victor.

Frustrated Buu decided to feed on the humans here then continue moving on, she just hoped for her sake that her duplicate was still putting up a fight...

"Wahh!"

The body double of Lady Buu yelled out as it was finally blasted to ashes by "Super" Videl. It was surprisingly durable and had bought the true Buu time to get away but with it now out of the way Videl made her next move.
1212312121111122112.title: Towards a nearby city.

choices: Videl calls out to them hoping to keep things peaceful between them all
Surprised, the kids instantly fuse! Looks like Videl's got a fight on her hands!
12123121211111221121.content:
"Nicely done, Videl." The majin girl heard Gohan's praises within her head and couldn't help but smile. The golden aura still surging around her, was this what Gohan, his dad, and little brother felt when they transformed? It was empowering it was amazing...

"Um...Videl? You still there?"

Through his link with Videl, Gohan could feel her emotional level spike for a moment. The good was that it didn't feel evil like Buu's but seeing that she was part Buu now that could be rather bad if left unchecked.

"Oh sorry...Gohan. It's just that well...I've never felt power quite like this before. Just some time ago I was just an ordinary high-school student now I'm so beyond that. I'm a human turned Majin Buu turned Super Saiyan!"

"And in the end you're still Videl. My friend...my love."

Videl chuckled as she felt a bit of steam release out of her body as she felt her cheeks flare up.

"Thanks Gohan...for everything."

"No problem. Unfortunately looks like Lady Buu got clean away while you pounded at her double."

Videl could feel his disappointment and despair, deciding it was best to cheer him up just a tad.

"Yeah but looks like tapping into your power scared her off. So long as I can do that I don't think she's going to be willing to fight me head on."

Videl smiled knowing that at last she had one upped on Buu. The monster was running scared that meant she could take her on on her terms.

"True but rushing right at her may not be a good idea. Trust me I know from experience a desperate enemy will go to any lengths to see you dead."

He was right she could give chase now but Buu would most likely aim to destroy the planet out of anger and desperation. Videl hated that she was giving the enemy time to heal but she had to pull back for now.

So off she went speeding through the air like a golden comet until she touched down on the lookout. The air bursting around her as her golden aura continued to shine away. With a sigh she said goodbye to her Super Saiyan state, it was an amazing power to have but she remembered it came with a responsibility and if there was anything Videl was sure about it was that she wasn't like Majin Buu.

Speaking of Buu the reason she came back here at all was to meet up with Piccolo, Trunks, and Goten their training should be just about complete all that was left was waiting for them to exit the interior of the outlook.

Looks like she didn't have to wait long as the doors flew up allowing the emerging trio access to the outside world.

Videl stared at the pieces. "Um.....then what should I...." she started to say before a piece attached to her arm.

"Ewww! Gross! Get off!" she shook her arm causing it to fling into another piece forming a piece that was slightly bigger. This piece then moved closer, attaching to her stomach.

"Sure you want to do that?" Lady Buu's voice said. "After all there's only so much of me...and you're friends....left." Videl hesitated. "That's not fair....." she growled. "Tough!" Buu replied before the pieces began moving at her like bullet.

Amusingly Videl noticed, she was breathing so hard her chest and stomach was actually visably inflating in and out, a weird quirk of her new physiology. "Wait a minute....." she thought.

121231212111112212222212.content:
All the pieces were twitching before they started to congregate at Videl's position! By instinct, Videl extended her hands out and started to increase her ki to protect herself until Gohan chipped in.

'Videl, wait! Lady Buu has a unfortunate point. You feel her life force, don't you?! If you increase yourself, you'll end up dissolving the rest of what's left of her!'

Videl's eyes widened and she lowered her guard and subsequently, lowered the ki barrier around her. Her eyebrows were furrowed and her teeth was clenched. This was seriously pissing her off.

'Sh...she knows that I won't kill her! That coward is using the people inside her as hostages!' she screamed, frustrated that she was cornered into this.

'Listen to me Videl. She's weak. This is the only chance we got to saving the others! You have to take her in while she's this willing!' Gohan reasoned.

The pieces all seemed to slow down as she was talking to Gohan. She knew he was right but...

'Gohan...I'm scared. What if I'm unable to hold her. What if she consumes me?!' Videl cried to the half-saiyan.

'Don't be afraid, Videl. That's only going to help her! You have to believe in yourself! I believe in you! No matter what, I'll be here for you...always...' Gohan reassured strongly.

Videl closed her eyes and nodded slightly. Gohan's words shook her to the core and she knew she had to stay strong for the sake of her friends. With that set in mind, she released any form of resistance and looked on with a determined shoulder.

"This is it, Lady Buu. I'll show you who'll be the victor in this battle," Videl growled as she was shadowed with pieces of her enemy, eager to assimilate with her.

What happened next was perhaps the most intense mental struggle as both Videl and Lady Buu screamed at the same time. There bodies melded together and both began fighting for control. What appeared to be a floating glob of goo was actually shaking up the planet, causing rubble to rise up from the air. Electricity shot out in all directions from the blob that twisted and morphed in every way possible.

Videl could hear her screaming at her. She could feel Lady Buu trying to fighting for control.

The glob of Buu started to take a more definite shape. First the arms...then the legs. Whoever was going to come out on top would have an even more curvaceous body. It was hardly the reward.

The last piece of the Buu was the head as it twisted and deformed in everyway imaginable. Their voices were unrecognizable together as both of them groaned and moaned.

Who came out on top?

"You...I won't forgive you! You took and killed everyone! I don't care how you managed to look like a girl, Buu. I will destroy you!" he yelled, giving a frighteningly alarming aura.

Gohan's eyebrows were furrowed as he glanced everywhere. Buu was able to sink in and out at her disposal. Why was that?

"Videl! I can't fight like this. Lady Buu is traveling around like nothing! It's hard to sense her too since she's hiding her energy!"

Videl gritted her teeth. "Gohan, I'm having my own problems here right now-shit!"

The area around Gohan rumbled and the half-saiyan grew worried. "Videl?!"

Outside, Videl was properly smacked down by a fast and pissed off Gotenks. Her body sped down and crashed into the an area of rocky mountains below. The sound of rubble falling and dirt rising was heard all around Videl's crashed body.

She began to cough from all the dirt. Right now, she was in a lot of hurt. For a body that was tangible, her pain receivers seemed like it doubled!

Quickly, Videl pushed her power level down and tried to hide it. Running wasn't going to help, she had to completely disappear to get away from Gotenks and Piccolo. Disappear...

Disappear...

'Videl! Please answer me! What's going on! Who's attacking you?'

She growled. "Your little brother and his friend Trunks...fused, I might add. Never mind that though, just quickly get that bitch inside me!"

Inside, Gohan was taken aback by this new information. Fused? What did that mean? Clearly, he missed out on a bit while he was at with Supreme Kai. He couldn't stay at their planet though when his friends were in danger.

"You really should pay attention to your surrounds, Gohan," a voice came behind him.

The half-saiyan's eyes widened and quickly turned to bring an elbow back. Powering up, Gohan growled but his attack once again hit nothing. Lady Buu had sunk to the floor dodging the half-saiyan's attack and then came back up in front of him with a smirk.

"This is superb! My sister is being pummeled on the outside while I get to stay on the inside safe. It's really too bad your girlfriend hasn't fully learned how to manage this body, otherwise I would've been in a pod now," she smirked.

Gohan clenched his teeth and glared daggers at the monster in front of him. It was obvious that he wouldn't be able to continue fighting her if she was able to travel anywhere inside. He needed Videl's cooperation on this.

"Videl and I will defeat you, Buu. No matter how long it takes!" he assured.

Buu chuckled and sunk below once again. "We'll shall see...Once I recover, I intend on escaping..."

Gohan gritted his teeth and then looked up. "I'm sorry Videl, but I can't finish her off when she's moving around. You have to somehow find out to properly confine her! Until then, I'm just defending myself here!"

Outside, Videl growled and cursed between her teeth. The current situation both inside her body and outside wasn't looking very good. So in addition to trying to escape Gotenk's wrath, she was missing an important detail on how to properly contain the people she absorbed. Now that she thought about it, everyone she had absorbed were weaker or in Gohan's case, willing. Lady Buu had more knowledge than she did so naturally, she was able to escape confinement.

This wasn't looking too good. What should she do?

Videl rolled her eyes and batted the ghost away. "Look boys, you really...." KABOOM!

A mushroom cloud erupted from the area. And when it cleared Gotenks smirked to see Videl standing there, clothes torn in all places, damaged pink skin all over her, and with an arm and half her chest totally gone!

As if by nature, she focused on her form and it regenerated. Her body grew back, and her clothes covered her once again. But something in Videl had been pushed. Maybe it was a combination of how she had changed as a Buu, but she was now ticked off on a female rage that was way too close to home to resist.
